title: Reiben the Se: Lost to Lands Unknown
description: Reiben was a happy, if somewhat overlooked, child on the Se Atoll. His curious mind never envisioned the men of might, the diminutive Florians or a one horned horse. Yet the universe had plans for this small boy as there was much to learn during the challenging times of antiquity.On Reiben’s first trip to the mainland, he was captured by the Malus and pulled to servitude in their hostile town. There he finds unexpected friends of varying sizes and a unique gift of Nature hidden from man for eons. His thirst to understand the gift leads him further from home to a forgotten people awaiting his arrival … for magic always beckons those with a pure heart.
author: R.D. Thomas
